author: kfogel
msg: Make sure ChangeLog includes regular files in `.' as well.

author: kfogel
msg: Added "make changelog" rule, runs cvs2cl.pl but only on certain
subdirs, of which apr/ is not one.  This makes ChangeLog generation
much faster, which is good, since 90% of the time we're looking for a
[This also means that `.' is being ignored, but that will require a
Reformat AUTHORS file for --usermap option to cvs2cl.pl.
